DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this proposed Department of Defense study is to evaluate the effect of Enhanced External Counterpulsation (EECP) on circulation, blood glucose control and blood pressure of type 2 diabetic patients receiving EECP therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating the Effects of EECP on Circulation, Blood Glucose Level and Blood Pressure in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: 1. Age equal to or greater than 18. 2. Type 2 diabetes mellitus. 3. Enrollment in the Travis AFB, CA EECP Clinic. 4. Department of Defense Beneficiary.
